document.full_text: sudan decided to create two additional states in darfur, state media said on thursday in what rebels have condemned as plan to strengthen khartoum's control over the troubled western region.
document.title: sudan divides darfur in five smaller states
lines_and_colors: sudan decided to create two additional states in darfur, state media said on thursday in what rebels have condemned as plan to strengthen khartoum's control over the troubled western region.
